sourcesContent:
Search For Flight
For
Passengers
{{flight.airline}}
{{flight.RemainingNumberOfSeats}} Remaining Seats
{{flight.departure.place}}
{{flight.departure.time | date}}
{{flight.departure.time | date:'shortTime'}}
{{flight.price}}
Book
{{flight.arrival.place}}
{{flight.arrival.time | date}}
{{flight.arrival.time | date:'shortTime'}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import * as moment from 'moment'; @Component({ selector: 'app-search-flights', templateUrl: './search-flights.component.html', styleUrls: ['./search-flights.component.css'] }) export class SearchFlightsComponent implements OnInit { searchResult: FlightRm[] = [ { airline: "American Airline", RemainingNumberOfSeats: 500, departure: { time: Date.now().toString(), place: "Los Angeles", }, arrival: { time: Date.now().toString(), place: "Istanbul", }, price:"350" }, { airline: "Egyptian Airline", RemainingNumberOfSeats: 200, departure: { time: Date.now().toString(), place: "Cairo", }, arrival: { time: Date.now().toString(), place: "New Youk", }, price: "350" }, { airline: "British Airline", RemainingNumberOfSeats: 125, departure: { time: Date.now().toString(), place: "London", }, arrival: { time: Date.now().toString(), place: "Cairo", }, price: "350" } ]; constructor() { } ngOnInit(): void { } } export interface FlightRm { airline: string; arrival: TimePLaceRm; departure: TimePLaceRm; price: string; RemainingNumberOfSeats: number; } export interface TimePLaceRm { place: string; time: string; }
